min-chars.description: Minimal character set for performance-critical contexts (100 characters)
min-chars.note: Minimal subset for font selection UI and performance-critical contexts

latin-basic.description: Basic Latin character set (A-Z, a-z, 0-9, basic punctuation)
latin-basic.note: Will be generated by admin tools when needed

cyrillic.description: Cyrillic character set for Russian, Bulgarian, Serbian, etc.
cyrillic.note: Will be generated by admin tools when needed

legalCompliance.derivativeStatus: Planned derivative works will comply with OFL-1.1
legalCompliance.attribution: Original font design by IBM Corp. Subsets generated for web optimization only.
